Posts.Content: Aug 29, 2013 03:09PM Believe4Life wrote: Hi Linda, There are many options for treatment and I know women who have done well on many of them, but my personal choice was to be aggressively treated at the start. I've been on Kadcyla and Xgeva ever since. Thank G-d I've had an incredible response and got to NED. I have good QOL with no hair loss, as the chemo in Kadcyla is targeted. What are your treatments? Hope they work well for you and with no side effects. All the best! :)
